hero.description: From design to implementation, we bring your IT project to life with a strong technical expertise and dedicated support.

bento.description: Our technical expertise aligns precisely with your business objectives. We develop performant and scalable SaaS solutions, guided by your specific needs and market requirements.

immersion.name: Immersion
immersion.description: Before writing a single line of code, we dive into your world. This first step consists of deeply understanding your vision, market, and objectives.

conception.name: Design
conception.description: With a clear understanding of your project, we move to the design phase. We define your SaaS architecture and develop key features.

development.name: Development
development.description: Our development team, guided by agile principles, builds your product. We work in short sprints, allowing for quick adjustments and total transparency.

launch.name: Launch
launch.description: The big day arrives: your SaaS launch. We monitor performance, gather user feedback, and continuously optimize the product.

monitoring.name: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor your cloud resources and applications in real-time. Visualize performance, usage, and costs to optimize your infrastructure.

technologies.main_description: Experience the best technology to grow your business! Our powerful solutions solve your challenges and help you stay ahead of competition.
technologies.main_description2: By combining cutting-edge technologies with deep expertise, we create customized solutions that will revolutionize your business and give you a decisive edge in the market.

realtime_analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
realtime_analytics.description: Live tracking of key performance metrics

data.subtitle: Maximum protection for your enterprise data with next-generation highly secure cloud infrastructure.
data.subtitle2: Performance, privacy, and AI capabilities guaranteed.

Azure.title: Azure
Azure.description: We take AI and data seriously. We deploy models (GPT, Mistral, Llama, etc.) on Azure to ensure data security and privacy.

Supabase.title: Supabase
Supabase.description: We've adopted Supabase as our database service for professional integrations and advanced security. This service allows us to achieve doubled execution speed.

ai.title: Generative AI.
ai.subtitle: Transform your business with custom generative AI solutions.
ai.subtitle2: From content creation to predictive analysis, our systems leverage the most advanced language models to automate your complex tasks.

LLmApis.title: LLM APIs
LLmApis.description: Using APIs from various market language models to produce robust systems has become second nature to us.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Features
advancedFeatures.description: In 2024, generative AI goes beyond chatbots by offering integrated features that revolutionize all sectors, from complex document analysis to task automation. Here are some examples below:

sites.title: Don't keep your users waiting
sites.subtitle: Today's modern technologies revolutionize the web experience by eliminating latency.
sites.subtitle2: These next-generation frameworks prepare all content upfront, offering navigation as responsive as a native application. The result? A premium user experience that naturally builds user loyalty.

perf.title: Optimal Performance
perf.description: Our applications anticipate your users' actions through intelligent systems. Everything is prepared in advance for instant navigation.

experience.title: Frictionless Experience
experience.description: Gone are visible loading times and jerky interfaces. Your application's content is intelligently orchestrated in the backend, then delivered optimally to your users.

features.explanation: Transitions worthy of a native app
Every user action is immediately visible
An experience that enhances your brand

deployment.subtitle: From design to deployment, we get your site online in just hours.
deployment.subtitle2: Our mastery of cloud platforms and automation processes enables fast and secure production deployment, giving you the agility to seize every opportunity.

infrastructure.title: Scaled to Your Ambitions
infrastructure.description: We configure the cloud infrastructure to automatically scale with your audience. From 100 to 1 million visitors, your site remains performant and responsive. No risk of downtime or slowdown, even during traffic spikes.

updates.title: Updates Without Interruption
updates.description: We implement continuous deployment solutions for smooth evolution. Each improvement is tested and deployed automatically, without impact on your users. Your site stays available 24/7, even during updates.

expertise.description: From first glance to last interaction, we create SaaS interfaces that captivate and convert.
expertise.description2: Our UI/UX expertise transforms complexity into elegance, offering your users a smooth and memorable experience, regardless of your industry.

permanent_contact.title: In Constant Contact
permanent_contact.description: We know that every business is unique. That's why our team makes it a point of honor to establish close and transparent collaboration throughout the development of your solution. From initial immersion to launch, we stay aligned with your objectives.

efficiency.title: Speed and efficiency: our signature
efficiency.description: Our agile methodology, combined with our mastery of the latest front-end technologies, guarantees the delivery of performant and scalable interfaces. Every pixel is designed to offer an exceptional user experience, regardless of your industry sector.

expertise.video_fallback: Your browser does not support video playback.

contact.title: Let's create your next project together.
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind? Our team of experts is here to turn your ideas into reality.

footer.description: Let's create tomorrow's digital solutions together. Our expertise in SaaS and AI at the service of your success.

team.memberDescription: Get to know the passionate people who bring our projects to life and make the magic happen every day.
team.subtitle: delivering excellence, driving growth
team.description: Young, ambitious, and driven by excellence. We are a team of innovators passionate about creating cutting-edge SaaS solutions that transform businesses.

solutions.title: Custom development solutions
solutions.description: Discover our packages tailored to your development and maintenance needs.
solutions.emphasis: Our team of experts accompanies you at every step of your digital project.

technical.title: Technical expertise
technical.subtitle: Full-stack Development
technical.description: A team mastering the latest technologies to bring your projects to life with excellence.

agility.title: Agility & Flexibility
agility.subtitle: Agile Method
agility.description: A proven methodology to adapt to your needs and ensure efficient deliveries.

support.title: Continuous support
support.subtitle: Maintenance & Support
support.description: Personalized guidance and technical support ensuring the sustainability of your solutions.

solutions.title: Our creations
solutions.description: Discover how we transform technological challenges into innovative solutions. Our portfolio showcases our expertise in development, infrastructure, and IT consulting.

portfolio.title: Our creations
portfolio.description: Discover how we transform innovative ideas into high-performing digital solutions for our clients worldwide.

hero.title: Let's Connect
hero.subtitle: From Paris to the rest of the world, we create innovative solutions for anyone.

info.title: Let's talk about your project
info.description: Whether you're an ambitious startup or an established company, we're here to turn your ideas into reality.

form.success: Message received! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: An error occurred, please try again later.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.heroText: We are not your typical development agency.
whyUs.heroSubtext: With dual expertise in software development and artificial intelligence, our agency designs the best market solutions for your business.

expertise.title: Recognized Expertise
expertise.description: Our team consists of experts graduated from the best French engineering schools.

ai.title: AI Mastery
ai.description: Our AI expertise allows us to optimize costs and timelines while ensuring superior quality.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We integrate the latest technological advances to ensure sustainable and scalable solutions.

support.title: Support
support.description: Tailored follow-up and complete transparency throughout your project.

whyUs.testimonial: We worked with KS for the development of our Spliit website and web app. Their support was comprehensive with strong technical expertise and a product-oriented approach.

portfolioHero.title: Our creations
portfolioHero.subtitle: From concept to completion, we bring your digital ventures to life with precision and innovation.

description.highlight: Leveraging cutting-edge technology and deep industry expertise to deliver exceptional results.
description.secondary: Our dedicated team turns ambitious visions into powerful, market-ready solutions that drive real business value.

testimonial.quote: Their team didn't just meet our expectations - they redefined what we thought was possible. The results speak for themselves.
testimonial.author: Florian de Milleville
